thread.title: Memphis Depay cuts off media because they mock his wardrobe
thread.title_full: Memphis Depay cuts off media because they mock his wardrobe

author: paulmbanks
title: Memphis Depay cuts off media because they mock his wardrobe
text:
When you look like this in public… 
Or this… 
Also, not to mention this…. 
…you’re going to get ripped by the media, and rightly so. Dressing up like a 19th century New Mexico cowboy, or wearing a skull/skeleton shirt with spray paint jacket will indeed get your fashion sense mocked. 
According to the Mirror, Memphis Depay has responded by not talking to the Dutch media at all during the international break. He reportedly told the publication “I don’t want to talk to you lot.” 
“Lot” meaning the media. Depay can do whatever he wants, but it’s hard not to side with the media on this one. 
Paul M. Banks owns, operates and sometimes writes The Sports Bank.net , which is partnered with FOX Sports Engage Network. The website is also featured on News Now. 
Banks, a former writer for the Washington Times, currently contributes to the Chicago Tribune RedEye. He also appears regularly on numerous talk shows all across the country. Catch him Tuesdays on KOZN 1620 The Zone.
